thread.title: Happyish Customer
thread.title_full: Instant Gaming évalué par Happyish Customer

author: Happyish Customer
title: Happyish Customer
text: You have to give them your address to make an account and give them your mobile number for security reasons . Apart from that receipt of game was instant and the price was the cheapest out of all the game key websites. Also they reply to tickets almost instantly which is nice shows that they care about customers. We'll be buying from them again in the future.
